page.title: 06Darlington Butcher's Bike
page.content:
{ } {Dirk Pittaway,}had just restored his 40 year old{butcher's bike. }He said it was a lot easier to deliver his goods to restaurants on a bike rather than in a car. While he was delivering some goods, he left his bike outside of a shop and it was stolen.
Later, Dirk Pittaway, the butcher, received a phone call from a man who said that he had seen a bike and immediately recognised it to be Dirk Pittaway's. Mr Pittaway phoned the police and they soon got to work and recovered his bike. The name plate was missing but otherwise there was no damage done to the bike itself. {Louise Davis}
